title: BRIEF-Spirit Aerosystems Reports Q4 Loss Of $1.15 Per Share
text:
* Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $1.15

* Q4 ADJUSTED LOSS PER SHARE $0.84 EXCLUDING ITEMS

* Q4 REVENUE ROSE 22 PERCENT TO $1.1 BILLION

* BACKLOG AT THE END OF THE FOURTH QUARTER OF 2021 WAS APPROXIMATELY $35 BILLION

* SPIRIT AEROSYSTEMS - QTRLY REVENUE UP 22% DUE TO HIGHER PRODUCTION DELIVERIES ON BOEING 737, INCREASED REVENUE FROM A220 & BOMBARDIER PROGRAMS

* SPIRIT AEROSYSTEMS - QTRLY REVENUE INCREASES PARTIALLY OFFSET BY LOWER WIDEBODY PRODUCTION RATES FROM IMPACTS OF COVID-19, PAUSE IN BOEING 787 DELIVERIES

* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.65, REVENUE VIEW $1.07 BILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
